robotcore
Class StateMachine

java.lang.Object
  robotcore.StateMachine

public class StateMachine
extends java.lang.Object

This is the main state machine class, this will keep track of the current robot states callbacks on this class will change the robot state and thus affect its actions in the core

Constructor Summary
StateMachine()
          Initializes the state machine, creates instances of the states
 
Method Summary
 State getCurrentState()
          Gets the current state
 void onCapture()
          Transition to the travelling state to the endzone
 void onDoneLocalizing()
          Transition to travelling state
 void onDoneSetup()
          Transition to Localizing State
 void onFlagZoneReached()
          Enter final state
 void onFound()
          Transition to the Capture State
 void onFoundWrongBlock()
          Transition to the BlockRemoval state (removes the block from the endzone
 void onObstacleDetected()
          Transition to the obstacle avoidance state
 void onPathModified()
          Transition back to the travelling state
 void onWrongBlockRemoved()
          Transition back to the search state
 void onZoneReached()
          Transition to search state
 void transitionTo(State state)
          Transitions to the new state calling onExit of the current state and on enter of the nextState
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
